column5: It just took around a minute for a reply to a thread to go thru for me, has anyone else noticed a slowdown on the site?
Seems to be only in the Mornings.  This morning good.
It's not just you sir, I've been ready to toss this puter out the window a few times in the last couple a days. Then I found out it's not my puter just this site.
Yup. Been noticing it for a few days now.  JF
TJ announced a few days ago the host would be doing server work over the next little bit.

Same here GCD, not yet this morning, but yesterday afternoon i couldnt even get on, then i could then i couldnt again, then i got on and couldnt respond to a thread etc etc...........seems fine so far this morning.
Sometimes lightning fast and other times it's like molasses in February.
Were fishermen we should all have some patience in us.
Oh I thought you meant are the board members gettin slow....My mother told me I'm not slow just special  Bushart
I'm having the same problems.  Sometimes I get here and then can't get to any other page on this site.  I usually leave and come back later.  Tom.
Could it be that some of us are just slow readers.....   (not me i just took a speed reading class)......
I think it's just going through customs.  Some of your words may be a bit questionable and deserves closer scrutiny.
That's the bad thing about it!!!... I pay for high speed internet to visit a site that is "dial-up" slow???  ... it's 9:42 p.m. CDST and the board is slower than smoke off of caca!!!

NOW thats funny...... Glen calling something slow. After all thats why the south lost the war." H e y   Y a l l t h e m    Y a n k  e e e S    i  s  f  i x   i   n   t o  c ooom  e     o  v  e  r    t   h a   ....... owwwww....hill.   Remember the veterans we served for all of our freedom  Art
